reviewText: great, something I had to have
Best team to ever represent the US at the Olympics.
if you are basketball fan, this is a great film for you. Its the BEST!!!!!!!!!!!

this video highlights some of the Greatest Basketball Talent ever on one team. Magic,Jordan&Bird were the Main Headliners but Charles Barkley stole the show overall.nevertheless what a Great Cast of Talent? you will remember this for a very long time if you are a fan of Basketball.

I've seen this video from a friend that's why I decided to order a copy from you. This is truly an excellent commemorative for the greatest team ever assembled in team sports. Up to now, I really can't believe that Mike,  Magic and Larry played for one team. I recommend this video to everyone who  loves basketball.
THE DREAM TEAM was an okay movie.. I wouldn't buy it unless I was a Keaton fan or something. It was okay to watch, and good to pass the time away if it come on TV.
